DOC.brief_summary: Propofol commonly use anaesthetic rapid recovery less side effect total intravenous anaesthesia ( TIVA ) propofol common technique . The reduction certain serum pro- inflammatory cytokine may lead smooth post- surgical recovery . Recent case report prove analgesic effect propofol infusion . However animal clinical study show controversial result . The aim retrospective study investigate postoperative analgesic effect side effect intraoperative TIVA propofol patient undergo surgery Queen Mary Hospital , Hong Kong 2014 2016 .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate TIVA With Propofol Postoperative Pain Side Effects
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : 1 . To investigate analgesic effect propofol . 2 . To evaluate effect propofol postoperative adverse event . Methods : Retrospective audit . Data Collection : 1 . Demographic data ; 2 . Types analgesic technique ; 3 . Type pain relief modality ; 4 . Pain score 72 hour postoperatively ; 5 . Postoperative opioid consumption ; 6 . Incidence adverse event APS care ; 7 . Patients ' satisfaction pain relief .
DOC.criteria: Anaesthetic record acute pain service record patient undergone surgery 2014 2016 Queen Mary Hospital would retrieve computer . Essential data miss . Patient participate research project . Changes postoperative pain management technique . Patients could assess postoperatively pain ( i.e . postoperative IPPV )
